spine_hook: Success = early-window buyer share 20–30% + store foot-traffic uplift ≥10% while event CPA stays ≤0.8× baseline and QR redemptions ≥5% of footfall.

anchors.headline: Event CPA ceiling for partner-led activity
anchors.expression: Event CPA ≤ 0.80× baseline CPA (ceiling to protect margin)

anchors.headline: QR redemption floor
anchors.expression: QR-driven redemptions ≥ 5% of visiting shoppers during activations

measurement_plan.why_it_matters: Keeps paid acquisition from eroding margin when swapping sitewide discounts for partner-led offers.

measurement_plan.metric: Buyer activity share vs promo intensity
measurement_plan.expression: Early-window transactions 20–30% while promo-SKU share ≈ last year (no blanket increase)
measurement_plan.notes: Track transactions in early window and percent of promo SKUs sold side by side weekly.
measurement_plan.why_it_matters: Protects margin by showing buyer growth came from time-limited collabs not broader discounting.

measurement_plan.expression: Visits ↑ 10–15% vs matched-week baseline (stretch ≥25% for high-performing stores)
measurement_plan.timeframe: Next three weekend activations starting Nov 22–Dec 13
measurement_plan.why_it_matters: Direct test of whether in-store collabs drive incremental visits without price cuts.

measurement_plan.expression: QR redemptions ≥ 5% of measured footfall during events
measurement_plan.why_it_matters: Provides a measurable conversion lever that links foot traffic to measurable CRM-able outcomes.
